Hey! Who are you?

Hello! My name is NhÃ n and I enjoy creating things with own hands, experience and skills. I used to be an interpreter and tour guide because of my passion in languages.

What has brought you to web development?

My interest in web development started back in 2021 after 2 years learning programming with Python. The more I dived into the web structure, the more I fall in love with JavaScript. And as a language lover, it hooked me (Though I know human languages and programming languages are not so the same).

Do you have any experience in professional web dev job?

What are you seeking now?
